VAR.NAME: SECURITY_UPDATES_VIA_MYORACLESUPPORT
VAR.DESC: OUI Session variable used to set if the security updates should be received via Metalink details

VAR.NAME: PROXY_PORT
VAR.DESC: The proxy port used to connect to Oracle metalink.

VAR.NAME: PROXY_PWD
VAR.DESC: The password for the proxy used to connect to Oracle metalink.

VAR.NAME: OUI_HOSTNAME
VAR.DESC: This variable holds the hostname of the system as set by the user.

VAR.NAME: UNIX_GROUP_NAME
VAR.DESC: Unix group to be set for the inventory directory. Valid only in Unix platforms.

VAR.NAME: ORACLE_HOME
VAR.DESC: Complete path of the Oracle Home.

VAR.NAME: PROXY_HOST
VAR.DESC: The proxy host used to connect to Oracle metalink.

VAR.NAME: DECLINE_SECURITY_UPDATES
VAR.DESC: OUI Session variable set to decline from receiving the security updates

VAR.NAME: MYORACLESUPPORT_PASSWORD
VAR.DESC: This variable represents the corresponding Oracle metalink password.

VAR.NAME: CLUSTER_NODES
VAR.DESC: This variable represents the cluster node names selected by the user for installation.

VAR.NAME: PROXY_USER
VAR.DESC: The username for the proxy used to connect to Oracle metalink.

VAR.NAME: MYORACLESUPPORT_USERNAME
VAR.DESC: This variable represents the Oracle metalink user name.

VAR.NAME: ORACLE_BASE
VAR.DESC: Complete path of the Oracle Base.

VAR.NAME: ORACLE_HOSTNAME
VAR.DESC: This variable holds the hostname of the system as set by the user.

VAR.NAME: ORACLE_HOME_NAME
VAR.DESC: Oracle Home Name. Used in creating folders and services.
